info.title: Alpine Ecommerce API
info.description:
# Alpine Ecommerce Backend API

Complete API documentation for Alpine Ecommerce e-commerce platform.

## Features
- üîê JWT Authentication
- üì¶ Product Management
- üõí Order Processing
- üí≥ Payment Integration (Razorpay)
- üë• Customer Management
- üìä Dashboard & Reports
- üìù Error Logging

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Include the token in the Authorization header:
```
Authorization: Bearer <your-token>
```

## Base URL
- **Current Server**: http://13.235.53.15:8081/api/v1
- **Configuration**: 
  - Set `API_BASE_URL` in .env for full control (recommended)
  - Or set `PRODUCTION_URL` for production domain
  - Or set `DOMAIN`, `PORT`, and `PROTOCOL` for auto-construction

## Response Format
All responses follow a consistent format:
```json
{
  "responseStatusCode": 200,
  "isError": false,
  "errorData": null,
  "successData": { ... }
}
```

## Error Handling
Errors are returned with appropriate status codes:
```json
{
  "responseStatusCode": 400,
  "isError": true,
  "errorData": {
    "displayMessage": "Error description",
    "apiErrorType": 1
  }
}
```

BearerAuth.description: JWT token obtained from /register or /login endpoint. Enter your token (with or without "Bearer " prefix)

isError.description: Indicates if the response is an error

apiErrorType.description: Error type identifier for frontend handling

isError.description: Indicates if the response is an error

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

NotFound.description: Not Found - Resource does not exist
